title: Lets Come Together
body:
We are a group of friends (15 Strong) looking to join arms with other groups in the community and make something amazing.

We have time resources and money.

We have a Team speak 3 Server and a skeleton for  a website and forum.

We are looking for anyone who wants to come shape the future, not just members to follow, but friends to lead.

**We want to bring a whole bunch of small clans and clubs together. If you are interested please get in contact with us.**

Best way is via email, brodie@thrzn.net, or our TS server. n2.goga.io

IGN GoGa B3ttsie

Cheers,
B3ttsie

replies.body: I only do orgies on weekends
